GET /radar/bgp/ips/timeseries.description: Retrieves time series data for the announced IP space count, represented as the number of IPv4 /24s and IPv6 /48s, for a given ASN.

parameters.description: Array of names used to label the series in the response.
parameters.name: name

schema.description: Array of names used to label the series in the response.

parameters.description: Filters results by date range. For example, use `7d` and `7dcontrol` to compare this week with the previous week. Use this parameter or set specific start and end dates (`dateStart` and `dateEnd` parameters).
parameters.name: dateRange

schema.description: Filters results by date range. For example, use `7d` and `7dcontrol` to compare this week with the previous week. Use this parameter or set specific start and end dates (`dateStart` and `dateEnd` parameters).

parameters.description: Start of the date range.
parameters.name: dateStart

schema.description: Start of the date range.

parameters.description: End of the date range (inclusive).
parameters.name: dateEnd

schema.description: End of the date range (inclusive).

parameters.description: Filters results by Autonomous System. Specify one or more Autonomous System Numbers (ASNs) as a comma-separated list. Prefix with `-` to exclude ASNs from results. For example, `-174, 3356` excludes results from AS174, but includes results from AS3356.
parameters.name: asn

schema.description: Filters results by Autonomous System. Specify one or more Autonomous System Numbers (ASNs) as a comma-separated list. Prefix with `-` to exclude ASNs from results. For example, `-174, 3356` excludes results from AS174, but includes results from AS3356.

parameters.description: Filters results by location. Specify a comma-separated list of alpha-2 location codes.
parameters.name: location

schema.description: Filters results by location. Specify a comma-separated list of alpha-2 location codes.

parameters.description: Filters results by IP version (Ipv4 vs. IPv6).
parameters.name: ipVersion

schema.description: Filters results by IP version (Ipv4 vs. IPv6).

parameters.description: Includes data delay meta information.
parameters.name: includeDelay

schema.description: Includes data delay meta information.

parameters.description: Format in which results will be returned.
parameters.name: format

schema.description: Format in which results will be returned.

aggInterval.description: Aggregation interval of the results (e.g., in 15 minutes or 1 hour intervals). Refer to [Aggregation intervals](https://developers.cloudflare.com/radar/concepts/aggregation-intervals/).

items.description: Annotation associated with the result (e.g. outage or other type of event).

isInstantaneous.description: Whether event is a single point in time or a time range.

level.description: Provides an indication of how much confidence Cloudflare has in the data.

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp of the last dataset update.

normalization.description: Normalization method applied to the results. Refer to [Normalization methods](https://developers.cloudflare.com/radar/concepts/normalization/).

GET /radar/bgp/routes/ases.description: Retrieves all ASes in the current global routing tables with routing statistics.

parameters.name: location

schema.description: Filters results by location. Specify an alpha-2 location code.

parameters.description: Limits the number of objects returned in the response.

country.description: Alpha-2 code for the AS's registration country.

ipv4Count.description: Number of IPv4 addresses originated by the AS.

ipv6Count.description: Number of IPv6 addresses originated by the AS.

pfxsCount.description: Number of total IP prefixes originated by the AS.

rpkiInvalid.description: Number of RPKI invalid prefixes originated by the AS.

rpkiUnknown.description: Number of RPKI unknown prefixes originated by the AS.

rpkiValid.description: Number of RPKI valid prefixes originated by the AS.

dataTime.description: The timestamp of when the data is generated.

totalPeers.description: Total number of route collector peers used to generate this data.

parameters.description: Return only results with the longest prefix match for the given prefix. For example, specify a /32 prefix to lookup the origin ASN for an IPv4 address.

GET /radar/bgp/routes/realtime.description: Retrieves real-time BGP routes for a prefix, using public real-time data collectors (RouteViews and RIPE RIS).

parameters.description: Network prefix, IPv4 or IPv6.
parameters.name: prefix

schema.description: Network prefix, IPv4 or IPv6.

parameters.description: Format in which results will be returned.
parameters.name: format

schema.description: Format in which results will be returned.

country_code.description: Alpha-2 code for the AS's registration country.

latest_realtime_ts.description: Latest real-time stream timestamp for this collector.

latest_rib_ts.description: Latest RIB dump MRT file timestamp for this collector.

latest_updates_ts.description: Latest BGP updates MRT file timestamp for this collector.

peers_count.description: Total number of collector peers used from this collector.

peers_v4_count.description: Total number of collector peers used from this collector for IPv4 prefixes.

peers_v6_count.description: Total number of collector peers used from this collector for IPv6 prefixes.

data_time.description: The most recent data timestamp for from the real-time sources.

rpki_validation.description: Prefix-origin RPKI validation: valid, invalid, unknown.

total_visible.description: Total number of peers seeing this prefix.

visibility.description: Ratio of peers seeing this prefix to total number of peers.

as_path.description: AS-level path for this route, from collector to origin.

collector.description: Public collector ID for this route.

timestamp.description: Latest timestamp of change for this route.

GET /radar/bgp/routes/realtime.summary: Get real-time BGP routes for a prefix
